SELECT A.GOV_METRIC_ID, B.GOV_METRIC_NM, A.MEAS_ID, A.MEAS_NM, A.UNIT, F_CODE_NM('013',A.UNIT, A.YEAR) UNIT_NM, A.RES_OF_PROPER, A.RES_OF_1_BEF, A.RES_OF_1_AFT, A.TARGET_BASE, A.INSERT_USER_ID, C.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM, A.SORT_ORDER, A.CREATE_ID FROM GOV_DETAIL_MEAS A INNER JOIN GOV_METRIC B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = B.GOV_METRIC_ID AND B.DELETE_DT IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER C ON A.INSERT_USER_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = #findGovMetricId#
A.INSERT_USER_ID = #findInsertUserId#
ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.GOV_METRIC_ID, B.GOV_METRIC_NM, A.NON_MEAS_ID, A.NON_MEAS_NM, A.TARGET_OF_PROPER_DESC, A.RES_OF_1_BEF_DESC, A.INSERT_USER_ID, C.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM, A.SORT_ORDER, A.CREATE_ID FROM GOV_DETAIL_NON_MEAS A INNER JOIN GOV_METRIC B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = B.GOV_METRIC_ID AND B.DELETE_DT IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER C ON A.INSERT_USER_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = #findGovMetricId#
A.INSERT_USER_ID = #findInsertUserId#
ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER

SELECT DISTINCT A.INSERT_USER_ID, B.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM FROM GOV_DETAIL_EVAL_ITEM A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_USERINFO B ON B.USER_ID = A.INSERT_USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID=#findGovMetricId#
A.INSERT_USER_ID = #authInsertUserId#

SELECT A.GOV_METRIC_ID, B.GOV_METRIC_NM, A.NON_MEAS_ID, A.NON_MEAS_NM, A.TARGET_OF_PROPER_DESC, A.RES_OF_1_BEF_DESC, A.INSERT_USER_ID, C.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM, A.CREATE_ID, A.SORT_ORDER FROM GOV_DETAIL_NON_MEAS A INNER JOIN GOV_METRIC B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = B.GOV_METRIC_ID AND B.DELETE_DT IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER C ON A.INSERT_USER_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = #findGovMetricId# AND A.NON_MEAS_ID = #nonMeasId# ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER

SELECT F_PGM_SERI('GOV_DETAIL_MEAS',#year#,'','','','') SEQ FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO GOV_DETAIL_MEAS ( YEAR , GOV_METRIC_ID , MEAS_ID , MEAS_NM , UNIT , RES_OF_PROPER , RES_OF_1_BEF , RES_OF_1_AFT , TARGET_BASE , INSERT_USER_ID , CREATE_ID , SORT_ORDER , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #govMetricId# , #SEQ# , #measNm# , #unit# , #resOfProper# , #resOf1Bef# , #resOf1Aft# , #targetBase# , #insertUserId# , #insertUserId# , #sortOrder# , SYSDATE )

SELECT F_PGM_SERI('GOV_DETAIL_NON_MEAS',#year#,'','','','') SEQ FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO GOV_DETAIL_NON_MEAS ( YEAR , GOV_METRIC_ID , NON_MEAS_ID , NON_MEAS_NM , TARGET_OF_PROPER_DESC , RES_OF_1_BEF_DESC , INSERT_USER_ID , CREATE_ID , SORT_ORDER , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #govMetricId# , #SEQ# , #nonMeasNm# , #targetOfProperDesc# , #resOf1BefDesc# , #insertUserId# , #insertUserId# , #sortOrder# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GOV_DETAIL_MEAS SET MEAS_NM = #measNm# , UNIT = #unit# , RES_OF_PROPER = #resOfProper# , RES_OF_1_BEF = #resOf1Bef# , RES_OF_1_AFT = #resOf1Aft# , TARGET_BASE = #targetBase# , INSERT_USER_ID = #insertUserId# , CREATE_ID = #insertUserId# , SORT_ORDER = #sortOrder# WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND GOV_METRIC_ID = #govMetricId# AND MEAS_ID = #measId#

UPDATE GOV_DETAIL_NON_MEAS SET NON_MEAS_NM = #nonMeasNm# , TARGET_OF_PROPER_DESC = #targetOfProperDesc# , RES_OF_1_BEF_DESC = #resOf1BefDesc# , INSERT_USER_ID = #insertUserId# , CREATE_ID = #insertUserId# , SORT_ORDER = #sortOrder# WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND GOV_METRIC_ID = #govMetricId# AND NON_MEAS_ID = #nonMeasId#
